snippet: Chipotle said it was reopening the 43 Pacific Northwest restaurants it closed during an E. coli outbreak after tests came back negative for the bacteria.
abstract: Chipotle Mexican Grill will reopen 43 Pacific Northwest restaurants after E coli scare; health officials conclude there is no lingering risk of contracting illness.
lead_paragraph: Chipotle said it was reopening the 43 Pacific Northwest restaurants it closed during an E. coli outbreak after tests came back negative for the bacteria.

headline.print_headline: Chipotle to Reopen Stores Closed During E. Coli Scare
headline.main: Chipotle to Reopen Stores Closed During E. Coli Scare
